    • Enemy

      protected Enemy​(Mode mode, Position position, java.lang.Integer score, Game game)
      Constructor that creates an enemy from an existing enemy mode of operation
      Parameters:
      mode - how the enemy should be created
      position - position in which the enemy is initially placed
      score - score given by the enemy when eliminated by the player

    • Enemy

      protected Enemy​(Mode mode, Position position, java.lang.Integer score, java.lang.Boolean isList, Game game)
      Constructor that creates an enemy from an existing enemy mode of operation
      Parameters:
      mode - how the enemy should be created
      position - position in which the enemy is initially placed
      score - score given by the enemy when eliminated by the player
      isList - validates if the enemy is created in a list
